main event: A Fiat object was observed off the shore, circular, about 600 feet wide. The witness reported seeing portholes in the object and blue gas.
interesting points: The object was luminous and about a mile from the observer.
A white cloud covered part of the object and the witness watched it disappear into the cloud.
The witness is not sure if the cloud formed from the flying object or if the cloud was already there.
The witness has additional information about unidentified objects that he could provide if questioned by competent scientists.
The witness believes the unidentified objects he has sighted are outer space craft.
sighted object: circular, luminous object about 600 feet wide
witnesses: 1 witness (David Hugh S. Bennett - USAF informant)
